name: @invintusmedia/tomp4
description: Convert MPEG-TS, fMP4, and HLS streams to MP4 with clipping support - pure JavaScript, zero dependencies

scripts.test: npm run test:clip && npm run test:mp4
scripts.release: npm test && npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run release

author: Invintus Media
